reference.title: Reference: Tooth Selection
reference.shortdesc: This section provides information on selecting a typodont, numbering system, tooth number, scanners, and scan type in the .

section.title: Overview
section.p: The Tooth Selection section of the allows users to configure tooth selection parameters before proceeding with scanning.

li.p: Select typodont: Choose from available typodont models (e.g., Columbia Dentoform-USyd).
Select numbering system: Choose the numbering format for tooth identification.
Select tooth number: Pick the specific tooth for scanning.
Scanners: Select the scanning device to be used.
Scan type: Choose the type of scan to be performed.

section.title: Save Selection
section.p: After making selections, users must confirm their choices by clicking the "Save Selected Options" button.
